name: Winter Floral Cushion
description:
As part of our Autumn/Winter 2013 cushion range, our Winter Floral cushion celebrates the rich colours of Autumn with Catherine's floral design featuring anemones and signature peonies. Every Peonie Cole cushion is printed in Edinburgh using a digital print process which retains that unique 'just painted' look of the design.

This cushion measures 33cmx43cm and is filled with a feather cushion pad. The cushion is finished with a pretty blue checked backing fabric for a twist of Scottish luxury.

name: Butterflies and Hydrangeas Cushion
description:
As part of our Autumn/Winter 2013 cushion range, our Butterflies and Hydrangeas cushion will bring the colours of the Autumn countryside into any home with Catherine's watercolour design. This cushion is the Autumn update of Peonie Cole's favourite from Spring, our Spring Blue Hydrangea cushion. Peonie Cole fabrics are all printed using a digital print process which retains that unique 'just painted' look of the design.

This hand-stitched cushion measures 33cmx43cm and is filled with a feather cushion pad. The cushion is finished with a blue checked backing fabric for a modern twist of Scottish luxury.

name: Butterflies, Brambles and Blooms Cushion
description:
As part of our Autumn/Winter 2013 cushion range, our Butterflies, Brambles and Blooms cushion will bring the colours of the Autumn countryside into any home with Catherine's watercolour design. This cushion compliments our other cushions in the AW13 range with a hint of each design brought together on one cushion. Every Peonie Cole cushion is printed in Edinburgh using a digital print process which retains that unique 'just painted' look of the design.

This hand-stitched cushion measures 33cmx43cm and is filled with a feather cushion pad. The cushion is finished with a cream checked backing fabric for a modern twist of Scottish luxury.

name: Birds, Berries and Brambles Cushion
description:
As part of our Autumn/Winter 2013 cushion range, our Birds, Brambles and Berries cushion will bring the colours of the Autumn countryside into any home with Catherine's watercolour hedgerow design. Every Peonie Cole cushion is printed in Edinburgh using a digital print process which retains that unique 'just painted' look of the design.

This hand-stitched cushion measures 33cmx43cm and is filled with a feather cushion pad. The cushion is finished with a cream checked backing fabric for a modern twist of Scottish luxury.

name: Spring Blue Hydrangea Cushion
description:
The perfect cushion to brighten up your room come rain, snow or Spring. This pretty cushion features Peonie Cole Blue Hydrangea fabric with buzzing bees and polka dots. The method of digital print retains that 'just painted' look of the design on linen union fabric.

This cushion measures 33cmx43cm and is filled with a feather cushion pad. The cushion is finished with a pretty blue checked backing fabric for a twist of Scottish luxury.

Designed and produced in Scotland.

name: Peony and Blue Tit Cushion
description:
*Two cushions left in stock* Please contact to request a special order.

This pretty cushion celebrates the beautiful meadows and birds found in Britain. The cushion features Peonie Cole Meadow fabric with the addition of a blue tit bird. The method of digital print retains that 'just painted' look of the design on linen union fabric.

This cushion measures 33cmx43cm and is filled with a feather cushion pad. The cushion is finished with a pretty blue checked backing fabric for a twist of Scottish luxury.

Designed and produced in Scotland.

name: Wildflower Meadow Cushion
description:
*One cushion left in stock* Please contact to request a special order.

Celebrate the beauty of the Scottish countryside in your home with this colourful cushion. This pretty cushion features Peonie Cole Wildflower Meadow fabric including poppies, bluebells and lavender. The method of digital print retains that 'just painted' look of the design on linen union fabric.

This cushion measures 33cmx43cm and is filled with a feather cushion pad. The cushion is finished with a pretty duck egg blue linen backing fabric.

Designed and produced in Scotland.

name: Peony and Bee Cushion
description:
For real flower lovers, this cushion brings beautiful blooms into your home all year round. This pretty cushion features Peonie Cole Peony fabric with a couple of buzzing bees. The method of digital print retains that 'just painted' look of the design on linen union fabric.

This cushion measures 33cmx43cm and is filled with a feather cushion pad. The cushion is finished with a pretty duck egg blue linen backing fabric.

Designed and produced in Scotland.

name: Peonie Cole Coasters
description:
A set of 6 unique coasters printed with a selection of Peonie Cole florals. Each coaster measures 4 inches square and are made with a hard wearing heat resistant surface and cork back. 

These coasters are the perfect addition to brighten up any room in your home and come as a set tied with ribbon.

name: Winter Floral Christmas Card
description:
Wish someone a very special Christmas by sending them this Winter Floral Christmas card by Peonie Cole. The card features a hand-painted floral design by Peonie Cole designer Catherine Beaumont, inspired by her beautiful natural surroundings of her home in the Scottish Borders. The card measures 148mmx148mm and is printed on premium card in Britain.

St. Columba's Hospice in Edinburgh will receive a donation from the sale of every Peonie Cole Christmas card sold this year.

name: Polka Dot Wreath Card
description:
Wish someone a very special Christmas by sending them this cute Polka Dot Wreath Christmas card by Peonie Cole. The card features a hand-painted floral design by Peonie Cole designer Catherine Beaumont, inspired by her beautiful natural surroundings of her home in the Scottish Borders. The card measures 148mmx148mm and is printed on premium card in Britain.

St. Columba's Hospice in Edinburgh will receive a donation from the sale of every Peonie Cole Christmas card sold this year.

name: Robin and Holly Polka Dot Card
description:
Wish someone a very special Christmas by sending them this cute Robin and Holly Polka Dot Christmas card by Peonie Cole. The card features a hand-painted floral design by Peonie Cole designer Catherine Beaumont, inspired by her beautiful natural surroundings of her home in the Scottish Borders. The card measures 148mmx148mm and is printed on premium card in Britain.

St. Columba's Hospice in Edinburgh will receive a donation from the sale of every Peonie Cole Christmas card sold this year.

name: Winter Floral Card
description: Send someone you love a Winter Floral card by Peonie Cole. The card features a hand-painted floral design by Peonie Cole designer Catherine Beaumont, inspired by her beautiful natural surroundings of her home in the Scottish Borders. The card measures 148mmx148mm and is printed on premium card in Britain. This card is blank inside for you to add your own lovely message.

name: Birds and Brambles Card
description: Send someone you love a Birds and Brambles card by Peonie Cole. The card features a hand-painted design (with brambles- the Scottish word for blackberries) by Peonie Cole designer Catherine Beaumont, inspired by her beautiful natural surroundings of her home in the Scottish Borders. The card measures 148mmx148mm and is printed on premium card in Britain. This card is blank inside for you to add your own lovely message.

name: Wildflower Meadow Card
description:
Send someone some pretty Peonie Cole florals with this unique wildflower meadow design featuring Scottish meadow flowers. This painting is printed on 300gsm TruCard, measures 148mm x 148mm and comes with a white postage envelope in a cello sleeve.

This card is blank inside so can be used for any occasion.

name: Peony Bee Card
description:
Send someone some pretty Peonie Cole florals with this unique peony design featuring a few buzzing bees. This painting is printed on 300gsm TruCard, measures 148mm x 148mm and comes with a white postage envelope in a cello sleeve.

This card is blank inside so can be used for any occasion.

name: Blue Tit Meadow Card
description:
Send someone some pretty Peonie Cole florals with this unique meadow design featuring a blue tit bird. This painting is printed on 300gsm TruCard, measures 148mm x 148mm and comes with a white postage envelope in a cello sleeve.

This card is blank inside so can be used for any occasion.

name: Love Valentines Card
description: Tell someone you love them this Valentines Day in a unique way with a Peonie Cole "Love" card. This pretty card features classic Peonie Cole florals with a romantic twist on 300gsm TruCard. The card measures 148mm x 148mm and comes with a white postage envelope in a cello sleeve.

name: Bee Mine Valentines Card
description: Tell someone they are special this Valentines Day in a unique way with a Peonie Cole "Bee Mine" card. This pretty card features classic Peonie Cole florals and bees printed on 300gsm TruCard. The card measures 148mm x 148mm and comes with a white postage envelope in a cello sleeve.
